about: At AV Homes, we understand that you’re looking for more than just a new house.  You’re looking for a home designed for you and your needs, a new home in a community where you feel a sense of belonging and unity, a new home that you can live in for years to come as your haven of comfort and joy.  Whether your new home search is for that perfect place to start the next chapter in your life where you can live an active 55-Plus lifestyle and meet new people, or you’re looking for the next house to call home for your growing family, AV Homes has new homes for sale for you.Interested in finding out more about one of AV Homes’ 55-Plus or traditional communities?  Sign up to be the first to hear about community updates, find out more information on AV Homes, and take the first step in finding your new home.

meta_data.description: AV Homes traditional family & 55+ communities in Arizona, Florida and North Carolina. Offering a variety of new homes & move-in ready homes for sale.

name: AV Homes Inc.
